menu_admin: case when ((SM.SM_Cmd is null) or (SM.SM_Cmd = '')) then (
/*Get first child if parent SM_Cmd is blank*/
inner join SRM on SRM.SM_ID=SMSUB.SM_ID inner join SR on SR.SR_Name = SRM.SR_Name inner join SPER on SPER.SR_Name = SR.SR_Name and SPER.PE_ID=@pe_id
where SMSUB.SM_ID_Parent = SM.SM_ID and (SMSUB.SM_Cmd is not null) and (SMSUB.SM_Cmd <> '')
inner join SRM on SRM.SM_ID=SM.SM_ID inner join SR on SR.SR_Name = SRM.SR_Name inner join SPER on SPER.SR_Name = SR.SR_Name and SPER.PE_ID=@pe_id
where SM_ID_Parent = (select SM_ID from SM where SM_NAME=@ROOT_MENU)
inner join SRM on SRM.SM_ID=SM.SM_ID inner join SR on SR.SR_Name = SRM.SR_Name inner join SPER on SPER.SR_Name = SR.SR_Name and SPER.PE_ID=@pe_id
inner join SM SM_Parent on SM_Parent.SM_ID = SM.SM_ID_Parent
where SM_Parent.SM_ID_Parent = (select SM_ID from SM where SM_NAME=@ROOT_MENU)
menu_client: case when ((SM.SM_Cmd is null) or (SM.SM_Cmd = '')) then (
/*Get first child if parent SM_Cmd is blank*/
inner join CRM on CRM.SM_ID=SMSUB.SM_ID inner join CR on CR.CR_Name = CRM.CR_Name inner join CPER on CPER.CR_Name = CR.CR_Name and CPER.PE_ID=@pe_id
where SMSUB.SM_ID_Parent = SM.SM_ID and (SMSUB.SM_Cmd is not null) and (SMSUB.SM_Cmd <> '')
inner join CRM on CRM.SM_ID=SM.SM_ID inner join CR on CR.CR_Name = CRM.CR_Name inner join CPER on CPER.CR_Name = CR.CR_Name and CPER.PE_ID=@pe_id
where SM_ID_Parent = (select SM_ID from SM where SM_NAME=@ROOT_MENU)
inner join CRM on CRM.SM_ID=SM.SM_ID inner join CR on CR.CR_Name = CRM.CR_Name inner join CPER on CPER.CR_Name = CR.CR_Name and CPER.PE_ID=@pe_id
inner join SM SM_Parent on SM_Parent.SM_ID = SM.SM_ID_Parent
where SM_Parent.SM_ID_Parent = (select SM_ID from SM where SM_NAME=@ROOT_MENU)
